mapper.select: select idx, name, email, content, post_date from guestbook where ${searchkey} like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by idx desc
select idx, name, email, content, post_date from guestbook where name like '%' || #{search} || '%' or content like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by idx desc
select count(*) from guestbook where idx = #{idx} and passwd = #{passwd}
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook (idx, name, email, passwd, content) values ( guestbook_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{content} )
